trans-unit.source: Invokes a Web service through a proxy class, which passes and receives parameters as specified.
This class cannot be inherited.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.InvokeWebServiceActivity"></xref> class.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.InvokeWebServiceActivity"></xref> class using the name of the activity.
The user-defined name of the activity.
Occurs when the Web service is invoked.
Represents the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty"></xref> that targets the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.InvokeWebServiceActivity.Invoked"></xref> event.
Occurs when the Web service is being invoked.
Represents the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty"></xref> that targets the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.InvokeWebServiceActivity.Invoking"></xref> event.
Gets or sets the method name of the proxy class that is called on the Web service.
The method name of the proxy class.
The default is an empty <xref href="System.String"></xref>.
Represents the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty"></xref> that targets the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.InvokeWebServiceActivity.MethodName"></xref> property.
Gets the collection of parameter bindings for the method specified by the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.InvokeWebServiceActivity.MethodName"></xref> property.

A <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.WorkflowParameterBindingCollection"></xref> for the method, specified by <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.InvokeWebServiceActivity.MethodName"></xref> property.
The default is an empty collection of type <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.WorkflowParameterBindingCollection"></xref>.

Represents the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty"></xref> that targets the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.InvokeWebServiceActivity.ParameterBindings"></xref> property.
Gets or sets the type of the proxy class used to communicate with the Web service.
If this property is set when the activity is in runtime mode a <xref:System.Data.ReadOnlyException> is thrown.
<xref href="System.Type"></xref> of the proxy used to start the Web service.
The default is an empty <xref href="System.String"></xref>.
Represents the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty"></xref> that targets the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.InvokeWebServiceActivity.ProxyClass"></xref> property.
Gets or sets a session identifier that indicates whether the session is shared across an activity, or if a new session is used.
If a previous <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.InvokeWebServiceActivity.SessionId%2A> is used, the session is shared.

An identifier that either contains the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.InvokeWebServiceActivity.SessionID"></xref> of a previous session or an empty <xref href="System.String"></xref> that indicates that a new session will be used.
The default is an empty <xref href="System.String"></xref>.
Represents the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty"></xref> that targets the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.InvokeWebServiceActivity.SessionId"></xref> property.
Returns the access type for the specified property.
Used at compile time to validate whether the properties are correctly bound to one other.
Without this interface this information is inferred directly from property getter/setters.
An object that implements <xref href="System.IServiceProvider"></xref> to provide access to design time services if they are required.
The name of the property.
An <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.AccessTypes"></xref> enumeration value that denotes the access level of the property.
Returns the <xref href="System.Type"></xref> of the specified property.
Used at compile time to validate whether the properties are correctly bound to one other.
An object that implements <xref href="System.IServiceProvider"></xref> to provide access to design time services if they are required.
The name of the property.
The for the property whose name is passed as the propertyName parameter.
